column4: once upon a time I had winblows, and I used notepad to record some IMPOTRANT info, I decided to upt faith into winblows in not shutting down, but apprently I was wrong, winblows did a automatic update without my approval and all the info I had in the notepad es lost... thanks winblows, for updating my computer without my approval
Thanks for sharing, do you have an Ubuntu related support question?
We'd appreciate if you kept the offtopic comments out of the channel, you can chat in #ubuntu-offtopic if you'd like though.
